website_summaries.verdict: Not the most luxurious sheets on the market, but they are a good fit and hold up well to washing.
pros: Fits most standard playards snugly and securely
SnugFit pockets ensure a secure fit
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: No elastic to keep corners in the sheet pockets, but elastic-free design keeps the mattress flat instead of curling

customer_reviews.title: Not snug, horrible sheets - do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend these sheets. I own a Graco pack n play playard and was looking for some sheets to use on the mattress. Even though these are sold by Graco, they do not fit snug on the mattress. The corners are not elastic. They are just folded in corners. I do not feel safe using these sheets on Graco's pack n play. Save your money and buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: KJo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Graco Pack-n-Play
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our Graco Pack-n-Play mattress. Pack-n-Play mattresses are segmented, so standard fitted sheets with elastic compress them, causing the foam to buckle and a creating a gap between the end of the mattress and the side of the Pack-n-Play. These fitted sheets are perfectly sized for the mattress, but don't have elastic, so they stay in place without any creasing while allowing the mattress to lie flat and fully expanded. The fabric isn't ultra-soft, but it's fine, perfectly comfortable for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the fit of these sheets, they are baggy for brand name. We sought out Graco brand sheets to be sure we’d get a tight fitting sheet for the pack n play, they are loose. The color is unattractive but because we thought the fit would be tight, we got these sheets even though the color is less than desirable.

customer_reviews.title: cute color but no elastics
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting for this to have no elastic around the edge. doesn't seem like it could hold up long in the wash with the way the edges are sewn. I still kept it because it will be nothing for me to just sew some elastics around the edges. but if i wanted to sew a sheet i would have done that in the first place but now I have to fix it. I'm afraid it will come up while my baby is rolling and sleeping without it being tight around the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: leahrb

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Update: While this sheet does work I have found much better sheets in quality and safety.   This sheet is not the highest quality, but it works. I wish it had elastic all the way around it for a better fit, but it does fit and stay in place so I feel it is safe for my little one to sleep on. I have had it for over a week, and have not had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: GOAT8

customer_reviews.title: Not a traditional “fitted” sheet
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint is with the “fitting” of these sheets. They are not a stretchy fitted sheet, and are quite loose on the Grace pack and play bassinet, so if you don’t want to constantly adjust to ensure baby safety, these are not for you. These stain very easily but do prevent the pack and play from getting stained. They get the job done, but I recommend looking for a more fitted solution if this is meant for the bassinet / where a baby will be napping.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Bridgmon

customer_reviews.title: Not soft or stretchy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our pack n play they fit fine on the thin insert but they are not very soft and don't have an elastic. They would not fit on a mini mattress well or on the thick mattress for the pack n play. Overall they seem durable but not high quality. When I first bought these a couple years ago there weren't many choices on Amazon but there are more now and I would recommend the American Baby Company sheets over these.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Loose, not safe sleep approved
customer_reviews.text: Ignore the spit up on the sheet lol I purchased this for a graco pack n play for a trip we’d be needing it for. Despite always being told to only purchase sheets from the manufacturer of the pack n play, this sheet has a lot to be desired; this is after one night sleeping on it and is pretty bunched up which is a no-no for safe sleep standards. Overall, pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: HollyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Finally a sheet with no elastic!
customer_reviews.text: It took me forever to find a sheet that does not have elastic edges. We use this for the firm foldable "mattress" that comes with the pack n play, and an elastic sheet makes the mattress fold. It is just cotton; not exceptionably soft or comfortable but it is just as expected. We bought another after receiving this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary334

customer_reviews.title: I bought the sheet recommended by the company
customer_reviews.text: This works but doesn't fit quite right. I don't know why, I bought the sheet recommended by the company. Material and color are nice - but with babies, you worry about the fit. I don't think it is dangerous or I wouldn't use it but Idon't understand why the sheet made for the Pack 'n Play doesn't fit it. It is made for a deeper matress but is still useable.
customer_reviews.author: MLG

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this pack 'n play for our when our grandchildren stay overnight. It sets up easy and is easy to take down. The mattress is used to fold around the outside when folded up (it took us 2 years before we figured it out), making storage easy as it doesn't take up much room and can be stored in a closet. This can be used for babies as well as toddlers
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Alt

customer_reviews.title: This sheet is too big!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this pack and play sheet fits neither of our pack n plays. We have both a Graco one and Mickey Mouse one from Sear; on both of the pack & plays, we have to tuck the extra fabric under the mattress which I hate. I don't know what kind of pack and play this was made for, considering it was a Graco branded sheet. I think I will Amazon recommended pack and play sheets from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: chesapeakegirl

customer_reviews.title: It fits the pack and play perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: The material is just OK. It is good enough for our visiting child but not necessarily the best material.
customer_reviews.author: W from Chicago Metro

customer_reviews.title: Shows stains
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these because our baby has reflux and we wanted to protect the pack n play mattress. Spit up soaks through, but there's not much to be done about that. My issues that even if the sheets are washed right away, they show stains and constantly look dirty.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: They really fit!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets fit the Graco Pack n' Play perfectly. You won't have a lot of excess sheet to deal with. They're made of wrinkle-free material, so they wash well and look smooth. (I believe they come in a knit material, too).
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I would expect better from graco. These are a terrible fabric, don't fit well and don't really have a way to hold the sheet on the mat. I feel as though that actually makes it unsafe to use as it comes loose easily and is a suffocation risk. Would not recommend will not be buying graco sheets again
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: fits decent, very thin, kind of pricey
customer_reviews.text: Sheets are very thin, but you're limited on options for a sheet. We needed something for our pack 'n play so we ended up using some thin plastic underneath the sheet to make it more resilient to staining the base. It fits a little lose as well, but it's not terribly bad. Ultimately they're doing the job, but we're concerned about how long they'll last due to how thin they are. We purchased a few and hope they last. If not, we'll look for a different solution.
customer_reviews.author: Travis J. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price at all
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. Fabric feels cheap and it has no stretch. Not very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey Sallee

customer_reviews.title: Ok sheets
customer_reviews.text: These are fine, they're not that soft or show comfy, so I honestly don't use them that often. Baby seems to sleep fine either way, not way better on these from what I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Z

customer_reviews.title: Very thin but nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice sheet, fit well but it’s VERY thin. I would recommend investing in the ones that are thicker otherwise it kinda defeats the purpose of needing it since the pack and play mattress is already cute.
customer_reviews.author: Savvylove

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. I wish it had elastic on ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. I wish it had elastic on the hem, as it fits so snugly that the seam on one corner ripped a little on a previous sheet after 1-2 yrs of use. Seems a little over priced, but I will never again NOT use a sheet since it makes it so much easier to clean up messes (ie. newborn spit-up, overflowing diapers, toddlers that would rather quietly play with their poo than ask for a change or take a nap).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap in price and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheap in price and cheaply made. We got this sheet as a spare for our second pack n play. It has been washed a few times and it is still very rough. I will keep it as a back up sheet but I would hate to use this as an everyday sheet due to how rough it is. And like others have said, it is pretty thin. It does fit our Graco pack n play very nicely though.
customer_reviews.author: WLC101

customer_reviews.title: Good sheets for the mattress
customer_reviews.text: Good sheets for the mattress. I like these sheets for the pack n play mattress. They wash well, and I have been able to get most stains out so far with regular detergent and Oxiclean for the tough stains. I'm not sure about others, but it seems like my sheets have stretched a bit, causing some puckering that needs to be smoothed out before putting the baby in the crib. They aren't as soft as I would have hoped, but they are a great bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Best cotton sheets for pack & play/portable crib!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this sheet is soft and allows room so pad/mattress doesn’t buckle. I use with bed sheet adjustable straps/garters to keep snug and secure
customer_reviews.author: Lioness

customer_reviews.title: Thin with no elastic
customer_reviews.text: This is very thin fabric, so much that I can see some of the design from the mattress through it. I assumed it would also be fitted with elastic like a regular fitted sheet, but it is not. The undertucking portion is merely sewn and there is very little overhang to hold it in place on the underside of the mattress. I used a 3" Dream on Me mattress with this sheet.
customer_reviews.author: DreaDamara

customer_reviews.title: Sheets are rough
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to find that these sheets were not very soft. Even after the first wash and dry they feel a bit rough to the touch. Baby only slept one night on them and it didn't go well, though I don't know if it's just the sheets that are to blame.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Inuwa

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: It’s not really soft but it’s not rough and hard either. It’s perfect for the play yard. You can wash it plenty times and it stays intact.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: Handy cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and it is nice to have something to cover the bottom of the pack and play that you can wash.
customer_reviews.author: Lavisai

customer_reviews.title: Well-fitting, no-frills sheets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after attempting to make my own sheets, which all made the Pack n Play's pad bunch up. Graco's secret? No elastic. The envelope folds mean that the sheet snugly fits the pad without making it bunch up. Many of the other sheets I looked at really fit an additional mattress pad, rather than the pad that comes with the Pack n Play. This is too bad since it would be nice to have more options - these sheets are rather thin and not very soft. Color and pattern options are uninspired as well. Overall, the good fit trumped other concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I expected much better from Graco. I bought this for a new Graco pack n play (simple solutions model) and not only is it cheap fabric, but it is too loose to be considered safe for sleeping and has no elastic to keep them in place. A 12 year old could have made a better sheet in a home-ec class.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my little one's playpen. It fit perfectly. She loves napping on it.
customer_reviews.author: Chrishellea

customer_reviews.title: Graco Aqua Crib Sheet
customer_reviews.text: Thin and no elastic as indicated. Not worth returning but definitely would not reorder. I would pay more and get a nicer one with elastic. We'll see if it stays on the mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Graco pac nplay sheet
customer_reviews.text: TheGraco pac n play sheet arrived on time.It fits great, true to size, is soft, and stretches just right to cover the P ac n play mattress
customer_reviews.author: Pamela E.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and extra protection
customer_reviews.text: This sheets fits perfectly with our pack 'n play. I love having the extra lining between my daughter and the pad in our pack 'n play. It makes cleaning the pack 'n play so much easier when a diaper leaks. The sheet has held up well through many uses and washings.
customer_reviews.author: MamaPanda

customer_reviews.title: fits pac n play mattress
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a pac n play mattress to use as a traveling crib. Needed the cover obviously, no complaints as it fit the mattress and didn't develop tears. Was very much worth what we paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Wood

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Got this before I got my pack and play. Once the pack and play came and I set it up, I put on the sheet. It fits perfectly and am glad I got it. That way if we need to clean up a mess it will be easier then having to wipe down the mattress. I am not sure why different colors were different prices when I purchased it, but that's okay. I really like this color and I think it looks good with the pattern on the pack and play I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Jillene A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheet
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what to expect from PackNPlay Sheet but I like this one. Washed and air dried (took 1-1/2 hours to air dry. Then tossed in dryer to soften, as I hadn't used softened since washing with towels, etc. Nice and soft. Coordinates well with my Graco Winslet Cuddle Cove.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for pack n play
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is soft enough that I feel comfortable with having LO sleep on it and fits perfectly and snug to the pack 'n play. I was also able to fit a waterproof liner underneath just fine for any accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Girlmommyx2

customer_reviews.title: Awful sheet
customer_reviews.text: The Graco pack n play sheet is terrible, don't buy it. I left our nice sheet on vacation and needed one quickly so I picked this up to go with our Graco pack n play but it was so bad we threw it away. It has no elastic so it comes off the corners easily and the material is very rough. Instead I ordered the American Baby Company 100% cotton sheet. It doesn't fit perfectly but comes close, stays on, and is much softer. Since Graco is the standard for pack n play yards, they really should improve the quality of their sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Washington, DC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install even with a four year helping. And good sturdy quality. I am happy
customer_reviews.author: aztxcyn

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are thin and the stitching is not very strong. I expect they won't last the year, especially since I have to use sheet suspenders to make sure the material doesn't bunch up while the baby is sleeping. Try to find something else if you're looking for tight-fitting sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Could be better quality. It doesn't have the elastic band that ...
customer_reviews.text: It'll do. Could be better quality. It doesn't have the elastic band that most fitted sheets do so you have to get it on perfectly aligned otherwise it has no give. It's also quite thin and not very soft.
customer_reviews.author: J. Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This sheet fits the pack 'n play nicely, but it is very thin. If you want a sheet, invest in the quilted pack 'n play sheet that is made instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M

customer_reviews.title: Good Sheet
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase for an inexpensive play yard sheet that will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Best pack-n-play sheet I've found so far...
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY pack--n-play sheet that we've bought which doesn't squish and deform the pack-n-play mattress! It's thin, but not too thin like a different brand I bought. Decent quality. Fits the mattress nicely. A little loose on the sides, but to me that's so much better than it ruining the mattress by squishing the guts out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Standard price. Used/Washed many times by now and the sheet is holding up as you would want it to. These do not have elastics, they are sewn in such a way that wraps around the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bennett

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fits the Graco Pack n Play and the bassinet too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: They fit the Graco Pack and Play very easily. They stay on the mattress when you fold it for storage as well.
customer_reviews.author: Beth S

customer_reviews.title: This sheet was terrible. Fit fine
customer_reviews.text: This sheet was terrible. Fit fine, but the material is not soft, very scratchy and left a light rash on my daughters face. I washed it on delicate mode in the washer and air dried it and the thread still came apart in the corners. I don’t normally right reviews but this sheet sucked. Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine!
customer_reviews.text: Put this on my pack 'n play and it seems to function just as it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: BLT

customer_reviews.title: Seems kind of thin, but I've been using it ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems kind of thin, but I've been using it for three months and there aren't any noticeable holes or worn patches, so I guess it's perfectly serviceable. I'll return with an edited review if any holes appear.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bulger

customer_reviews.title: This sheet sucks it has no elastic so it just lays over ...
customer_reviews.text: This sheet sucks it has no elastic so it just lays over the mattress basically plus it was super hard to get on
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: This fitted sheet was slightly too small for my son's ...
customer_reviews.text: This fitted sheet was slightly too small for my son's Dream on Me mattress for his mini-crib, but I managed to squeeze the mattress into it. It is a well-made sheet, but unfortunately, it irritated my son's eczema, so we ultimately had to go with a softer, 100% cotton sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C Bickley

customer_reviews.title: Flat sheet. Fits pack n play mattress well. ...
customer_reviews.text: Flat sheet. Fits pack n play mattress well. The sides are not elasticized, so it can come loose a little easier, though I've not had too many problems with this. It does keep the Velcro areas on the accessible, so the mattress stays in place with the Velcro (I had other sheets that had partially covered the velcro areas).
customer_reviews.author: AJ Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I love these sheets so much I bought several
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets so much I bought several. They fit snug enough that I felt comfortable putting my newborn on them, but not so snug that they cause the mattress to fold up, like some of my sheets with the elastic did.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Graco specific sheets not necessary for your pack n'play
customer_reviews.text: I have no problem with this product- it is what it is, a cotton fitted sheet to fit onto your pack n'play. However I found sets of two sheets at Target (Circo brand) for the same price as one Graco sheet and they fit just fine. They are snug so you don't have to worry about SIDS dangers. As a first time mom I was a little reluctant to purchase something for the pack n'play that was designed specifically for it but I saved money by purchasing non brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: not very soft but will work.
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 4 stars only because the sheet is not very soft. However, it does fit perfectly and matched my pack n play nicely..
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hoel

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Pack n Play!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my grand daughter's Graco pack n play perfectly. Pretty aqua color. Ended up ordering a 2nd one
customer_reviews.author: Krissi

customer_reviews.title: Basic, thin, sort of scratchy, but good enough
customer_reviews.text: This is a really basic, thin sheet I bought for the Graco Pack 'n Play. It's sort of scratchy and not that great, but it works. If you're looking for something soft and more luxurious, this is not it. But if you just want a cover for the pack n play pad, then this will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Anthropod

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The sheet arrived in a timely manner and fits the pack n' play. It isn't as soft as I would like, but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Fits but you don't want your baby sleeping on it.
customer_reviews.text: This fits the Graco packnplay perfectly & the print is nice....however, gets 3 stars for the poor quality. The fabric is really rough, thin and I don't like using it unless I really haven't done bedding laundry & it's a quick back-up. I bought a jersey fabric crib sheet and pin it instead and it works fine. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: TexasTurtlegirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very basic, not particularly soft, doesn't even have elastic. Great for the price, though. Fits (just barely) the mattress of my Graco pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: Hotdog

customer_reviews.title: Thin Fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. The fabric is very thin & not very soft. My daughter takes naps in the pack n play. I bought these because I was worried about using a sheet that's too big. All the SIDS warnings say 'only used approved snug fitting sheets.' Well because this sheet is so thin I have to place a burp cloth or towel under her anyway. So I could have saved $10 and just put a towel down.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: great basic sheet
customer_reviews.text: Fits the graco pack and play perfectly. If you are good at sewing, this doesn't look complicated with no elastic , just seamed folded corners. I might use this as a pattern and make another put of fleece for colder months. The aqua color matches the winslet color scheme perfectly. I use this to protect the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: It does fit the pack and play mattress well but I recommend the pack and playard quilted sheet over this one ...
customer_reviews.text: The material of this sheet is rough and cheap appearing, there are many loose strings around the edges. It does fit the pack and play mattress well but I recommend the pack and playard quilted sheet over this one based on quality and looks alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The material is rough
customer_reviews.text: It fits my pack n play but the material is rough, I washed it to make it soft but it is still rough.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Correa

customer_reviews.title: I added a thick blanket between the sheet and mattress and the sheet still fits fine.
customer_reviews.text: A must have for the pack n play, get 2 or 3 while you're at it. I added a thick blanket between the sheet and mattress and the sheet still fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: JGGaia

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre at best
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY cheaply made. Super thin material and it’s still loose when put on my Graco pack n play pad. Does the job to cover the pad but that’s about it. If you’re looking for something really fitted, soft, or thicker.... buy elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The sheet fits the mattress perfectly and softens up the more it's washed. Not the best quality Cotton, but works great for us for the amount of time we actually need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Toomuchstuff

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality fabric but there aren't many other choices, sooo...
customer_reviews.author: ROOT

customer_reviews.title: Matches my playpen perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is great for either a boy or girl and matches the accent color of my Graco playpen. The sheets are soft and the color doesn't faze when you wash it
customer_reviews.author: Pinkribbon20Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: This is a knock off Graco Pack 'n Play Playard ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a knock off Graco Pack 'n Play Playard sheet. Same cost as original, though not authentic. Don't bother!
customer_reviews.author: Dana I.

customer_reviews.title: and is easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Fits the thin pack n play mattress perfectly, and is easy to put on. My only gripe is that this color (dark brown) shows stains easily and for some reason holds spit (not spit up, just drool) as a dark stain.
customer_reviews.author: lada

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits Graco pack in play bassinet mattress well. I put waterproof pad underneath.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Sheet
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this sheet. My biggest concern is that it doesn't have elastic corners. Because of this it doesn't stay nice and tight. I don't think it will come off, but the fabric bunches up. It's also not the softest material. The color is true to the picture though! That's about the only reason I gave one star. I will definitely be purchasing a different sheet for our pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gilardi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits our pack n play mattress really well and has a really good color. Very pleased with our purchase. Has held up well in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of fabric
customer_reviews.text: Material is really thin. I will rather just have quilted type. It is really thin that can't even catch any drooling from my baby and just go thru to the mat.
customer_reviews.author: I. C

customer_reviews.title: Good but wish it were a fitted
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were a fitted sheet. It's too loose for my liking, since it just kind of wraps around the mattress pad with nothing to actually keep it there.
customer_reviews.author: MyOwnSatelliteTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use with our Graco Pack and Play as it says you have to use only Graco Sheets for the Pack and Play because it has a risk of suffocation. Nice quality, fits perfectly, washed it already and looks new after the 1st wash. Very reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: The color isn't exactly what I was hoping it would ...
customer_reviews.text: The color isn't exactly what I was hoping it would be and the part that goes under the pad do not stay as well as a true fitted sheet.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pulsipher

customer_reviews.title: Fitted sheet
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly for the pack n play. This is a thin fitted sheet, it doesn't have elastic around the edges but it stays on well.
customer_reviews.author: Renee L

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I received this sheet today and put it on the 3 inch Dream On Me Foam Graco Pack and Play Mattress.If the sheet was a TAD bit bigger in length and width or had elastic like a regular fitted sheet it would be much better. I had to fold the mattress corners to fit the sheet on. The seams along the length of the sheet gave instantly and you can see the thread. I love that it matches perfectly with my Calypso pack n play but softer fabric and a little more fabric would make a vast improvement. I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very shallow corners so it’s hard to pull this sheet over, and the material isn’t soft.
customer_reviews.author: Briana O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: With most baby products, you buy them because they match. That was the case here for me. I needed additional sheets for my Pack n Play, and this matched. However, it is very stiff and scratchy. Not comfortable at all. If you are able to, get the soft quilted Pack n Play sheets. Much cozier for your little one!
customer_reviews.author: Bea's Knees

customer_reviews.title: Not so soft
customer_reviews.text: The material is pretty thin and not very soft. I was hoping that it might add an extra level of comfort for our little one since we are using the Pack 'n Play for co-sleeping, but putting down a flat receiving blanket and tucking it down seemed to be more comfortable than using this sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Reese P.

customer_reviews.title: but I rather go with a safe good fitted sheet over a soft less fitted one
customer_reviews.text: It fits my graco pack n' play perfectly. Its not the softest material, but I rather go with a safe good fitted sheet over a soft less fitted one.
customer_reviews.author: B Rose

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a nice quality product..........
customer_reviews.text: These seemed nice, and I ordered a couple for the Graco Pack n Play at our house for our Grandaughter. Nice quality but was not large enough for the Pack n Play. Maybe it was because I had added a little Amazon mattress. I gave them to my daughter, and it fits her Pack n Play, just fine. ???????
customer_reviews.author: Karen D. Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for about a month and have to wash them about every other day (frequent spitter-upper) and they are holding up well (no obvious wear - still crisp!). They are fairly thin, but they serve their purpose and I'm not afraid of them getting ruined. They fit the pack 'n play well (graco). Baby seems to either like them or not really care, because he sleeps well. I will probably buy more so I have to do laundry less frequently!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love the color of this
customer_reviews.text: Most of these items are gifts for my daughters baby shower. Love the color of this sheet
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Shupock

customer_reviews.title: Color is pretty, but I bought this because it is supposed ...
customer_reviews.text: Color is pretty, but I bought this because it is supposed to be specifically fitted for the graco play yards.....it's not. It's baggy and has no way to be fitted to the mattress for the play yard bassinet. It's probably okay, but I paid for a specialized product, not something okay for my newborn. Trying to reduce the risk of SIDS here Graco.....come on.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer21

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to bunch up on the pack and play
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to bunch up on the pack and play. Not very soft material either. Only bought because it is decently priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine but not great
customer_reviews.text: The material on this sheet is not very soft. Even after washing it still feels rather rough. It fits the pack n play mattress though. I think the quilted sheets are more comfortable and softer.
customer_reviews.author: Minh N

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Low quality and cheaply made for what we paid for it. The material is not soft either and it doesn't fit the pack n play pad well at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the Pack 'n Play I purchased for my grandson when he visits. Washes well and is comfortable on a babies soft skin.
customer_reviews.author: Fran G

customer_reviews.title: So it's not false advertising just a bad choice of photo
customer_reviews.text: For those that complained about the quilted look, Its actually because the sheet is shown on the mattress. No where does it say in description is it quilted. So it's not false advertising just a bad choice of photo. I'm quite happy with my sheet. It's a pretty pattern and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would be more like a fitted sheet
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed when this arrived in the mail. The material feels really really cheap and its scratchy. You have to wash it several times before its soft. I could have made this myself, I thought it would be more like a fitted sheet!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: Came Ripped
customer_reviews.text: I have used Graco sheets before and they were OK. But this one came with the sewing incomplete on one side, so I had to sew it myself. I needed to use it right away, so didn't have time to send it back -- but I would have done so it I could. Doesn't anyone at the factory check these things before they go out?
customer_reviews.author: Like2Read

customer_reviews.title: Security without worry
customer_reviews.text: Fits Graco pack in plays securely. The fitted sheet has retrofitting pockets. It does not slide around, and is breathable. If you have a graco pack and play only use graco pack and play sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Its alright for the price
customer_reviews.text: The color is gorgeous but the material was a bit scratchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pierren

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this sheet
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. I also bought a pac n play mattress pad. However, this sheet won't fit over it & it is so rough & stiff. I've washed it twice even with fabric softener, but it didn't make it any softer. I agree with the reviewer who said he wouldn't let his dog sleep on it let alone my grandchild!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Graco Pack 'n Play Playard Sheet, Aqua
product_meta.description:
Color:AquaThis soft, durable, fitted sheet for your Graco Pack 'n Play helps you provide a fresh, clean, and comfortable environment for your little one, no matter what's thrown your way.

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: Measuring 27 inches by 39 inches the sheet fits most playards
Graco playard sheets come with SnugFit pockets to ensure a secure and comfortable fit every use
Practical and washable for keeping playards ever-fresh

specifications.Material Type: Phthalate free, Bpa free, Lead free, Latex free
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars666 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
